name: Introduction to Programming
description: An introductory course covering basic programming concepts.
syllabus: Variables, Data Types, Control Structures, Functions

name: Data Structures
description: Fundamental data structures and their implementations.
syllabus: Arrays, Linked Lists, Stacks, Queues, Trees

name: Algorithms
description: Analysis and design of algorithms.
syllabus: Sorting, Searching, Dynamic Programming, Greedy Algorithms

name: Database Systems
description: Introduction to database management systems.
syllabus: Relational Model, SQL, Database Design, Normalization

name: Web Development
description: Building web applications using modern technologies.
syllabus: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, Express.js

name: Operating Systems
description: Principles and design of operating systems.
syllabus: Processes, Memory Management, File Systems, Synchronization

name: Computer Networks
description: Fundamentals of computer networking.
syllabus: TCP/IP, Routing, Switching, Network Security

name: Software Engineering
description: Principles and practices of software development.
syllabus: Requirements Engineering, Software Design, Testing, Maintenance

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Introduction to artificial intelligence techniques.
syllabus: Search Algorithms, Knowledge Representation, Machine Learning

name: Machine Learning
description: Foundations of machine learning algorithms.
syllabus: Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Deep Learning

name: Big Data Analytics
description: Analyzing large-scale datasets.
syllabus: MapReduce, Hadoop, Spark, Data Visualization

name: Cybersecurity
description: Protecting computer systems from cyber threats.
syllabus: Network Security, Cryptography, Ethical Hacking

name: Cloud Computing
description: Fundamentals of cloud computing technologies.
syllabus: Virtualization, Infrastructure as a Service, Platform as a Service

name: Mobile App Development
description: Building applications for mobile devices.
syllabus: Android Development, iOS Development, Cross-platform Frameworks

name: Computer Graphics
description: Principles and techniques of computer graphics.
syllabus: 2D Graphics, 3D Graphics, Rendering Techniques

name: Natural Language Processing
description: Processing and analyzing natural language data.
syllabus: Text Processing, Language Models, Sentiment Analysis

name: Computer Vision
description: Understanding and interpreting visual data by computers.
syllabus: Image Processing, Object Recognition, Deep Learning for Vision

name: Blockchain Technology
description: Principles and applications of blockchain.
syllabus: Distributed Ledger, Smart Contracts, Cryptocurrencies

name: Quantum Computing
description: Introduction to quantum computing principles.
syllabus: Quantum Gates, Quantum Algorithms, Quantum Cryptography

name: Robotics
description: Design and control of robotic systems.
syllabus: Robot Kinematics, Robot Dynamics, Motion Planning

name: Human-Computer Interaction
description: Study of interaction between humans and computers.
syllabus: User Interface Design, Usability Testing, Interaction Techniques

name: Internet of Things
description: Connecting physical devices to the internet.
syllabus: Sensors, Actuators, IoT Protocols, Cloud Integration

name: Computer Ethics
description: Ethical and social issues in computing.
syllabus: Privacy, Intellectual Property, Cybersecurity Ethics

name: Embedded Systems
description: Designing and programming embedded systems.
syllabus: Microcontrollers, Real-time Operating Systems, Embedded Software

name: Compiler Construction
description: Principles of compiler design and construction.
syllabus: Lexical Analysis, Syntax Analysis, Semantic Analysis, Code Generation

name: Game Development
description: Creating interactive games using game development tools.
syllabus: Game Design, Game Engines, Graphics Programming

name: Virtual Reality
description: Designing and developing virtual reality experiences.
syllabus: VR Hardware, VR Software, Immersive Environments

name: Ethical Hacking
description: Defensive and offensive techniques in cybersecurity.
syllabus: Penetration Testing, Vulnerability Analysis, Cyber Attack Techniques

name: Digital Image Processing
description: Processing and analysis of digital images.
syllabus: Image Enhancement, Image Restoration, Feature Extraction

name: Bioinformatics
description: Application of computer science in biological research.
syllabus: Genome Sequencing, Sequence Alignment, Molecular Modeling

name: Computational Biology
description: Computational methods in biological sciences.
syllabus: Protein Structure Prediction, Genome Analysis, Systems Biology
